items.title: Qualcomm Readies Rack-Scale AI With New Chips And Roadmap
items.description: Qualcomm announces new chips, cards and rack-scale solutions for the AI data center, but omits key details.

items.title: Pregnancy Care Ends Too Soon. How The Postpartum System Fails Mothers.
items.description: Women often feel unsupported while postpartum, a time when they are most at risk for physical, emotional, and social challenge. Experts share how they...

items.title: Microsoft Says Windows 11 Isn’t Broken Even When Duplicate Updates Appear
items.description: With multiple recent Windows updates causing problems for users, Microsoft says that it’s safe to ignore certain updates even when duplicates appear.

items.title: ‘IT: Welcome To Derry’ Gets Early Episode 2 Release, Has 3 Season Plan
items.description: Episode 2 of IT: Welcome to Derry is airing early on HBO Max, and we now know this show wants to run for at least three seasons.
